title: WCAS ART 390-0-22 Special Topics in Art

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Art 390-0 Special Topics: Project Digital Film
Stephen Reinke

Project Digital Film is a studio class in which artists produce six short digital films, often incorporating other elements: animation, audio, installation, performance, writing, etc. The class is constructed to accommodate students at all levels of technical proficiency. The quarter is divided into six projects/challenges, each lasting three periods. First Period: Lecture, screening and discussion of artists' work. Project challenge given. Second Period: Equipment and software demos, work period. Demos are optional (depending on your knowledge/proficiency). Third Period: Screening and discussion/critique of projects. No prerequisites required.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
No Prerequisites apply.

1st Class is mandatory.

subject: ART
